member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_RANGE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies a range so that, for example, if part of a descriptor table has 100 shader-resource views (SRVs) that range can be declared in one entry rather than 100.

member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_RANGE_TYPE.D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_RANGE_TYPE_UAV
member.summary: Specifies a range of unordered-access views (UAVs).

member.name: D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_RANGE_TYPE.D3D12_DESCRIPTOR_RANGE_TYPE_CBV
member.summary: Specifies a range of constant-buffer views (CBVs).
